texts.en: Ulamsuren is a 63-year-old man who lives with his wife in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. His wife is a retiree. He started repairing cars in 2005. At that time, it was quite a new business. Therefore, he is considered to be a talented, good repairman in the town and has many regular customers. He runs the business inside the fence and supplies the best services to the customers. Ulamsuren is a hardworking man who says that, "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the necessary repairing materials so that I could offer many kinds of auto services and increase the volume. Not only the profits, but I also try to have the best services for the customers". The total amount he is requesting is 3,400,000 MNT to buy auto repairing materials for the business.

loans.use: To buy auto repair materials

loans.name: Janice

texts.en: Janice is married, 25 years of age, and lives in Kinuman Norte, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental together with her two kids. Janice is operating a sari-sari store to earn a living. She has been in this business for two years and she earns 5,000 PHP every month. She is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store. She joined GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Janice will use her income to support her two kids in their studies until they finish college and in their daily needs. Janice wishes that her business would be more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her general store

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan, 33, works hard to provide for her family. She is engaged in a hog-fattening business as a source of income. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs. She is hoping for higher income this time.

Susan aspires to save enough money for the education of her two children.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru:
Кларе 33 года, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Клара с 2000 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес  с покупки теленка на сумму 2,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день  в хозяйстве Клары имеется  3 дойные коровы, 10 овец, 3 лошади,   доходы от продажи молока позволяют покрыть ежедневные расходы семьи.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Клара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Клара планирует частично вложить в ремонт дома, а в дальнейшем - в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Klara is 33 years old, married and raising three children.  To provide a primary source of income for her family, Klara has been involved in animal husbandry since 2000, having started this business with a purchase of a calf with 2,000 som (KGS).  Today her business contains three dairy cows, ten sheep, three horses, and the earnings from the sale of milk allow her to cover the family's daily expenses.  In order to further develop her business, Klara requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan partially into house repairs and future business expansion.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana Cecilia es una emprendedora que se le ha apoyado en el crédito para que invierta en el negocio en la compra de productos y ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad de productos, el sueño más grande de la emprendedora es tener su negocio bien abastecido de variedad de productos. Esta emprendedora ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000, y nos expresa la emprendedora que gracias al apoyado que se le ha brindado ha aumentado sus productos y de igual manera sus clientes, actualmente está nuevamente solicitando financiamiento para comprar productos como granos básicos, jabón, detergente, pan, pasta de dientes, verduras, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia is an entrepreneur who has been helped with credit, so that she can invest in the business through buying products and offering her customers a variety of items. This entrepreneur's greatest dream is to have a store well-stocked with a variety of goods.

This entrepreneur has already been working with Fundación León 2000, and tells us that thanks to the support she has been provided, she has increased her merchandise, and similarly her customer base. Currently, she is again applying for a loan to buy products such as staple grains, soap, detergent, bread, toothpaste, vegetables and other goods.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, soap, detergent, bread, toothpaste, vegetables, and other products.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталье 37 лет, замужем, воспитывает сына. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Наталья – кондитер по образованию -  с 2000 года занимается торговлей хлебобулочными изделиями и продуктами питания, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 1,000 сом (KGS). Также, семья Натальи занимается пчеловодством, продавая местному населению мед в сезон. На сегодняшний день  бизнес Натальи приносит около 40,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Наталья обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение товарооборота.  Доходы от кредита Наталья планирует частично вложить в ремонт дома, а в дальнейшем – в открытие собственного магазина.
texts.en: Natalya is 37 years old, married and raising a son.  To provide a primary source of income for her family, Natalya, a trained pastry chef, has been involved in selling baked goods and food products since 2000, having started this business with an initial sum of 1,000 som (KGS).  Her family is also involved in beekeeping, selling honey to the local residents during the season.  Today, Natalya's business yields about 40,000 som per month.  In order to further develop her business, Natalya requested a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase goods turnover.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan partially into repairing her house and then into an opening of her own store.

loans.use: to increase goods turnover

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Нигина проживает в районе Джиликул. Ей 46 лет. Она разведена. У нее четверо детей. Она занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур. Этим видом деятельности занимается 18 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nigina lives in the Jilikul district.  She is 46 years old, divorced and has four children.  Nigina is involved in growing melon crops.  She has been in this business for 18 years.  She is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Zukhra

texts.ru:
Зухре 32 года, воспитывает двух дочерей 12 и 5 лет.  В поисках дохода для своей семьи,  в 2007 году Зухра начала свой бизнес в торговле одеждой с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS).  Благодаря упорному труду Зухры, на сегодняшний день ее оборотные средства составляют около 200,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зухра обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение товарооборота.  Доходы от кредита Зухра планирует вложить в расширение ассортимента товаров за счет канцелярских товаров.
texts.en: Zukhra is 32 years old and raising two daughters, who 12 and 5 years old.  In search of a source of income for her family, Zukhra started her business of selling clothing in 2007 with a sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistent work, today her working capital amounts to about 200,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Zukhra requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase goods turnover.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into expanding her merchandise selection by adding office products.

loans.use: to increase goods turnover

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 8 children. 

Cresencia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages to resell.

Cresencia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Cresencia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 4 children. 

Marites has a shop that sells vegetables like string beans, ampalaya and patola. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for PHP 11,000 to buy stocks of vegetables to sell.

Marites has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Marites hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy vegetables to resell

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en:
Oyuntsetseg is a 39-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 5 children in Uvs province in Western Mongolia. Her husband is employed and 5 of the children study at the local secondary school. 

Oyuntsetseg has been running a dairy products retail and grocery trading business for 10 years. At first, she just used to trade grain flour, but now she trades different kinds of milk dairy products like milk, dried curds, fat and others. She runs the business at the shop counter. Now she needs some assisstance to purchase the supplies in large quantities. 

Oyuntsetseg is an active and good-natured woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the supplies in wholesale so that I could sell them in normal price and increase the volume. I have a further plan to save for my children's college and future."   The total amount she is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy milk products from herders.

loans.use: buy milk products

loans.name: Wencie

texts.en:
Wencie is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has 2 children. 

Wencie has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for PHP 12,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell.

Wencie has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Wencie hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has 1 child. 

Elizabeth has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for 6 years.  

Elizabeth requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.   Elizabeth has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is from Pantaon, Ozamiz City. She is 43 years old. Elizabeth is married and has 5 children. 

To make a living, Elizabeth owns & operates a business venture, planting & harvesting a variety of vegetables for sale. Elizabeth has been in her business for 10 years and earns 3,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2011, Elizabeth joined GDMPC. 

Elizabeth is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions for her family.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is married and has 5 children. She is 39 years old and lives in the Sebasi, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Merlyn is a farmer and manages her family work which is coconut production to earn a living. She has been doing this for 8 years and every month she earns PHP 3,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to pay for the labor cost in harvesting coconut.

Merlyn been a member of GDMPC in 2011. In the future, she hopes her children can finish their studies.

loans.use: pay for labor cost to harvest coconut

loans.name: Irene

texts.en: Irene is from Kinuman Norte, Ozamiz City. She is 36 years old, married, and has six children. Irene owns and operates a business raising pigs for sale. She has been in her business for five years and earns 8,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Irene joined GDMPC. Irene is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase livestock feed & other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed & other supplies

loans.name: Mirzokhuja

texts.ru: Мирзохуча проживает в районе Пяндж. Ему 57 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Мирзохуча четыре года как занимается скотоводством. Он берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Mirzokhuja lives in the Pyandj district.  He is 57 years old, married and has three children.  Mirzokhuja has been involved in animal husbandry for four years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Martha Irene

texts.es:
En el municipio de Telica, la señora Martha trabaja como maestra de primaria  habiendo adquirido muchos honores por su dedicación y profesionalismo. Actualmente está dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 23 años, es Soltera, no tiene hijo, y labora en un colegio de la localidad de telica.
Una de las necesidades que la señora Martha  atraviesa hoy en día es de mejorar su vivienda en lo que a techo y embaldosado se refiere, la que se encuentra en mal estado, ya que debido a esta necesidad  tomó la decisión de visitar Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como: Cemento, Aren, Piedrín, Tejas y Mano de Obra,  ya que de esta manera mejorará sus condiciones  y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Martha works in Telica municipality as a primary teacher, having achieved many honors for her dedication and professionalism. Currently she has been working in this occupation for 23 years. She is single, has no children, and works in a school in Telica.

One of the needs that Martha experiences today is that of improving her home with regard to the roof and the floor tiling, which is in poor condition. Due to this need, she made the decision to visit Ceprodel to apply for a loan to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, gravel and tiles, and to pay for labor. In this way she will improve her conditions and standard of living.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as cement, sand, gravel and tiles, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 5 children. 

Maribel has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 12,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Maribel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Maribel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Bazarbek

texts.en:
Bazarbek is a 43-year-old man who lives with his wife and 3 children in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. His 2 older children study at the college and the youngest child goes to the secondary school. His wife is unemployed. 

Bazarbek has been running taxi service business since 2011 with his small van. In addition, he does all types of weldings. Bazarbek is planning to develop the welding business because he can do it inside his fenced property. Bazarbek is a talented welder who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by buying a new machinery of cold weld and torch. I am trying to be the best on the welding business."  The total amount he is requesting is 1,500,000 MNT to purchase a welding machinery.

loans.use: purchase welding machinery

loans.name: Naranhuu

texts.en: Naranhuu is 59 years old and lives with her husband, five children and grandchild in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. Her husband is a retiree. She has been running a bakery since 1995 based on her experience. She bakes different types of bread, fine pastries and cookies at home and trades them at the trade center in the town. Her bakery goods are famous for their taste and appearance. Naranhuu is a talented confectioner who says that, "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the bakery materials. I always try to bake tasty and healthy bakeries to my customers". The total amount she is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT to purchase the bakery raw materials for her business development.

loans.use: To purchase bakery raw materials

loans.name: Abdusattor

texts.ru: Абдусаттор житель района Пяндж. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Абдусаттор занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает бахчевые культуры. Этим видом деятельности занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян арбуза.
texts.en: Abdusattor is a resident of the Pyandj district.  He is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Abdusattor is involved in agriculture.  He primarily grows melon crops.  He has been in this business for six years.  Abdusattor is requesting this loan to buy watermelon seeds.

loans.use: to buy watermelon seeds

loans.name: Irodamoh

texts.ru: Иродамох проживает в районе Пяндж. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем. Иродамох у себя дома занимается шитьем национальных платьев и наволочек на заказ. Этим видом деятельности она занимается три года. Кредит берет для приобретения новой швейной машинки.
texts.en: Irodamoh lives in the Pyandj district.  She is 26 years old, married.  Irodamoh is involved in sewing national dresses and pillow slips to-order at home.  She has been in this business for three years.  Irodamoh is requesting this loan to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Iskandar

texts.ru: Искандар более пяти лет занимается растениеводством. Он при доме имеет участок земли, где выращивает бахчевые культуры. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Искандар берет кредит для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Iskandar has been involved in agriculture for over five years.  He has a plot of land by his house, where he grows melon crops.  He is 40 years old, married and has four children.  Iskandar is requesting this loan to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Rocelyn

texts.en:
Rocelyn is 49 years of age and aspires for a better lifestyle. With her ability to work at various occupations, she is hoping to save enough money for the improvement of their living situation.  She is operating a piggery business and working in the field. These tasks are not easy but Rocelyn devotes herself to these works. 

She has no choice because she wasn’t able to finish her college education. Despite this, she is patiently enduring the hardship of her work just to provide her family with a good life. In this matter, she is asking a loan of PHP 10,000. She will be going to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs in order to make them healthier and to dispose of them soon at a higher price.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins

loans.name: Khudoynazar

texts.ru: Худойназар проживает в районе Пяндж. Он женат. Ему 44 года. У него трое детей. Худойназар более шести лет занимается выращиванием овощей. Кредит берет для закупа семян.
texts.en: Khudoynazar lives in the Pyandj district.  He is 44 years old, married and has three children.  Khudoynazar has been involved in growing vegetables for over six years.  He is requesting this loan to buy seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds in order to grow tomatoes

loans.name: Irma Petronila

texts.es:
Irma, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, para mantener trabajo en el cultivo de maíz, pues con esta siembra se asegura para la alimentación de su familia, con este préstamo comprara fertilizantes y semilla, que son los necesarios para que ella pueda iniciar el cultivo.
El prestamos anterior le ayudo también en los cultivos, logrando producir 40 quintales de maíz, los cuales unos destino para la alimentación y otros para la venta, manteniendo su situación económica en la familia.
texts.en:
Irma’s decided on a new loan to keep growing corn because she guarantees her family’s food with this crop.  She will use the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds which are needed to start the planting.

Her previous loan also helped her with the crops managing to produce 40 quintals of corn some of which she used for their own food and others to sell thereby maintaining her family’s economic situation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 27 years old and is blessed with one child. She is a hardworking entrepreneur because of her child, who will soon require an education. She involves herself in managing a sari-sari store in her own house. 

Maricel is borrowing PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock such as canned goods and noodles. With her own effort, she gained income and her achieved income from her store will be saved for her child's future.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Mrs. Keo is a 58-year-old married woman who lives in the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. She earns a daily income of around USD 1.25 planting rice crops on her existing farmland. She has five children, four of whom are ready married and living in their own houses, while the youngest one still stays with her and depends on her small income.  Mrs. Keo also gets more revenue from her husband, who is a domestic laborer in his community.

Mrs. Keo will be using her loan to buy a new cow, as the old one cannot support her in the field. In the future, Mrs. Keo wishes to purchase a few plots of farmland in order to enlarge her crop-growing business, and  to repair her broken house.

loans.use: buy a cow

loans.name: Oyumaa

texts.en:
Oyumaa is a 41-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Umnugovi province in Mongolia. Her husband is employed and their 3 children study at the secondary school.  

Oyumaa opened a small food store in 2011 near to her home. The income has been raised more because the store is on the way of domestic and foreign tourists. She plans to grow the business further.  Oyumaa has been raising the family income and improving the household.  She is a hardworking woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the food supplies in large amounts from the capital city. I am planning to increase the income, preparing my child's college expenses." The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to purchase more food supplies for her store.

loans.use: restock her grocery store

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en: Daisy is known as hardworking mother of three children. She endures hardship in managing her piggery business for the bright future of her children and wishes to have a greater income through her business.  For this purpose, she is applying a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy feed, medicines and vaccines.   Through the loan, she hopes to improve her business as well as to acquire improved income.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.en:
Ermelinda is from Poblacion, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old, married, and has 5 children. Ermelinda owns and operates a gardening business for a living. She has been in her business for 6 years and earns 3,000 PHP a month.  

In 2008, Ermelinda joined GDMPC. Ermelinda is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: purchase seeds, seedlings & young crops

loans.name: Naung

texts.en:
Mrs. Naung, 49, is a local cultivator and devoted mother of four children. She lives in Prey Chhor district and earns an income by planting rice crops as well as feeding some pigs with her husband. They have four children, three are single and one is married.   In order to gain more profits, Mrs. Naung’s husband runs another business as a motor taxi driver in and around his village. The couple can earn a revenue of about USD 3.25 per day. 

In order to earn extra income, Mrs. Naung would like to request a loan to purchase more piglets to breed.  This loan will make her standard of living better with the additional income from selling her pigs when they are big enough.

loans.use: buy more pigs

loans.name: Batbayar

texts.en:
Batbayar is a 28-year-old man who lives with his wife and 2 children in Umnugovi province in Mongolia. His children go to kindergarden. 

Batbayar has been planting vegetables of different sorts since 2009 with his wife. The average amount he produces is around 10 tonnes a year. He rents the land and performs all the activities with his wife. This business is the only financial source for them to support their two children. 

Batbayar is a hardworking and nice man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity to raise the income and support my family more. I need some support to buy the seeds of potato and onion. I have a big plan to expand the business activities by increasing the income and supplying the best vegetable." The total amount he is requesting is 1,135,000 MNT to buy vegetable seeds.

loans.use: buy vegetable seeds

loans.name: Oyunbat

texts.en:
Oyunbat is a 47-year-old woman who lives with her husband and a son in the suburban district of the capital city of Mongolia. She used to trade meat products at the market but now she delivers freight. She has been using her brother's truck for the business and this developed her household and she is increasing her income little by little.  Her customers are appreciating the service and it is considered to be a reliable business. 

Oyunbat is a diligent woman who says that she would like to develop her business activity by buying her own truck. She wants to improve the household with her husband. The total amount she is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy a fence for her family.

loans.use: buy a fence

loans.name: Den

texts.en:
Mrs. Den is 36 years old. She is a domestic farmer who resides in Prey Chhor district of Kompong Cham province. She has experience in this work since 1990. She has a life partner in her husband and they have three single children.  

To make more income, Mrs. Den wants to buy a second-hand motorcycle for her husband for the purpose of running a motor taxi service so they can increase the profit from this new occupation.  Unfortunately, they do not have sufficient cash to make this possible. That is why Mrs. Den has decided to ask for a loan from Kiva partner with HKL to purchase a used motorbike.

loans.use: buy a motorbike to start a transport business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, who operates a hog-fattening business, is a woman with a good heart. At the age of 50, she has the urge to help other people. Because her principle is "when she was the one who’s in need, people will help her too", so, despite her occupation, she still cares to help. 

To save extra income for her family and others, she needs to make her business more progressive. In connection with this, she is asking for additional working capital of PHP 10,000 to maximize and improve her hog-fattening business. This will be used to purchase vitamins and feed for her hogs. Through this, she will be able to help more people.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and feed

loans.name: Delicia

texts.en:
Delicia is a 49-year-old married woman living with her four children. Her spouse works on the farm. She is operating a piggery business for income in addition to her husband’s income. She has been in this business for four years.

Delicia would like to increase her sales as she disposes of her pigs soon. As a result, she is borrowing a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy vitamins, feed and vaccines to provide nourishment and have healthy livestock. She hopes to gain enough income to provide a good education for her children because this is the only thing that they can inherit from her.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, feed and vaccines

loans.name: Lor

texts.en:
Lor is 55 years old and widowed. She has been working as a seamstress for more than 20 years. She provides sewing services and restores clothes, robes and outerwear to local people in her commune. She is able to make an average of 7.00 USD per day through her business. Lor presently lives with her only son and her younger sister in her own house located in Phnom Penh city.

To improve her business as well as her living condition, Lor is taking out her first loan from HKL to renovate her present house and purchase raw materials for her sewing business such as cloth, thread and buttons. Her business goal is to enlarge a medium seamstress store and purchase additional sewing machines and other machines that have different functions to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to renovate her present house.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar, trabaja como chofer propietario de un vehiculo de transporte de pasajeros en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento completo de su vehiculo y compra de un motor, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener a su familia.
Oscar, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos, vive en casa propia en la zona de Obrajes de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la quinta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la cuarta vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Oscar works as a driver/owner of a passenger transportation vehicle in the city of La Paz.  He needs the loan to service the vehicle and to buy an engine because it’s the only source of income he has to support his family.

Oscar is married and has four children.  He lives in his own house in the city of La Paz’s Obrajes zone.  This is the fifth time he’s worked with IMPRO and the fourth with KIVA.

loans.use: to pay to service his vehicle and to buy an engine for it.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es: La Sra. Ramona  tiene 52 años y es divorciada con 2 hijos que son de las edades de 10 y 18 años La Sra. Ramona es  modista se dedica a la confección de distintas prendas de vestir,  su taller se encuentra en la zona Villa Unión, este préstamo es su tercera  secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.  Ramona utilizara  este préstamo  para la compra de telas e hilos para la confección de prendas de vestir y así de esta manera incrementar capital de trabajo para su negocio, la Sra. Ramona  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son alta demanda de este mes por inicio de clases. Y va a utilizar los beneficios compra de maquinas de costura. Y su deseo  para su negocio es tener su taller de costura más grande y poder emplear mano de obra, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Ramona, 52, is divorced and has two children who are 10 and 18 years old.  Ramona is a dressmaker; she makes various types of  clothing.  Her workshop is located in Villa Unión.  This loan will be her third cycle within the institution.  Ramona will use this loan to buy fabric and thread to make the clothes so that she can increase working capital for her business.

The challenge Ramona faces is high demand because classes start this month.  She will use profits to buy sewing machines.  Her wish for the business is to have a larger workshop and to employ staff.  She feels happy and grateful for the opportunity she’s being given.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, debido a la necesidad de invertir en el negocio,  comprando ropa nueva blusas, camisetas, short, y vitaminas para salir a vender, este préstamo le ayudara a mantener surtido el negocio y mejorar la disponibilidad.
Tuvo un efecto positivo en el préstamo anterior, que le ayudo a mejorar el negocio y ofrecer a los clientes, también atendió nuevas zonas, sus ingresos han mejorado.
texts.en:
Marta has decided on a new loan because she needs to invest in the business buying new clothes: blouses, t-shirts and shorts and vitamins to go out to sell.  This loan will help her keep the business stocked and have more availability. 

Her previous loan had a positive effect because it helped her improve the business and offer to customers; she also sold in new zones and her income has improved.

loans.use: to buy clothes and vitamins to sell.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad de obtener los insumos agrícolas para la siembra, pues se dispone a iniciar el cultivo de maíz, para lo que comprara abono, fertilizantes y pesticidas.
El considera haber tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, que le facilito el trabajo en la agricultura, obtuvo buena cosecha y así pudo cancelar el préstamo; las condiciones de vida de él y su familia han mejorado.
texts.en:
Luis has opted for a new loan because he needs to obtain farm supplies for his crops because he intends to plant corn again for which he needs manure, fertilizer and pesticide.

He feels that he got a positive effect from his previous loan that made his farming work easier; he obtained a good harvest and was able to repay the loan.  His and his family’s living conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Elsy Yanira

texts.es:
Elsi,  está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertir más en el negocio, comprara ropa para niña y lociones de ambos sexos, con esta compra espera surtir el negocio, mejorando la condición del negocio.
Ella manifiesta haber tenido una buena experiencia con el préstamo anterior, pues le ayudo a incrementar las ganancias, considera que ha logrado una condición de vida mejor, más solvente, pero que aun hay que continuar mejorando.
texts.en:
Elsi’s asking for a new loan to invest more in the business.  She will buy clothes for girls and lotions for both genders.  With this purchase she hopes to stock the business improving its conditions.

She states that she had a good experience with the previous loan because it helped her increase profits.  She feels that she’s attained a better living condition; she’s more solvent but still must continue to improve.

loans.use: to buy clothes for girls and lotions.

loans.name: Gicela Maritza

texts.es:
Gisela, necesita invertir más en el negocio, comprando materiales para continuar en la producción de las tortillas, como el maíz y leña, que le ayudaría a comprarlos por mayor cantidad para mantener disponible y a su alcance.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, mejorando con su clientela y los ingresos a su familia también, estando mejor en la actualidad.
texts.en:
Gisela needs to invest more in the business buying supplies to continue making tortillas like corn and firewood and it would help to buy it in larger amounts to have readily at hand.

She had a positive effect with her previous loan improving her clientele and family income too; they are better now.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Carmen De Jesus

texts.es:
Carmen, solicita un nuevo préstamo, porque su interés es mantener el negocio surtido de productos frescos, por eso piensa invertir en la compra de verduras plátanos, güisquiles, papas, pipianes, tomates, chiles, que son muy demandados por los clientes.
Ella considera que a través de estos préstamos, su condición familiar ha mejorado, ha tenido algunos problemas de salud en su familia, pero han sabido controlarlos.
texts.en:
Carmen’s asking for a new loan because she’s interested in keeping the business well stocked with fresh products.  This is why she plans to use the loan to buy vegetables, bananas, chayote, potatoes, pumpkins, tomatoes and chilies which are in high customer demand.

She feels that through these loans her family condition has improved.  There have been some family health problems but they’ve managed to control them.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Son

texts.en:
Son, 38, owns and manages a rice farming business in Ang Snoul district, while her husband works in construction to support the family. Together, they are able to earn an average income of $7.00 USD per day. They endure the hardships and difficulties they encounter in life because they want to educate their three children and ensure a bright future for them.

With the requested loan of $1,200 USD, Son wants to buy a motorcycle to better her standard of living and satisfy her family’s needs. With this loan, Son’s family can reduce their daily expenses for transportation, saving the money for future family emergencies. In the future, Son plans to further improve her farming business and increase her rice production.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to better her standard of living and satisfy her family’s needs.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is operating a hog fattening business as a source of income. She patiently works for the welfare of her four children. She dreams that her children will be successful someday. She is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to maximize her business by purchasing feeds and medicines. 

She will continue pursuing her children's education in order to achieve their dreams as well as to achieve a good life.

loans.use: to purchase animal feeds and medicines.

loans.name: Ma

texts.en:
Ma is 58 years old. She is married and blessed with one single child. She and her husband cultivate rice on farmland they inherited in Kampong Chhnang province. They plan to improve their rice farming business by increasing their yield and income to meet their family's needs and to educate their child. They have been in this business for almost 20 years.

For additional income, Ma wants to get involved in another business: raising pigs. Due to insufficient capital, Ma is asking for a loan through HKL to purchase piglets and feed to fatten them. She hopes to obtain this loan so she can improve her business, enabling her to increase her profits and to save some money for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Chhin

texts.en:
Chhin is 48 years old and a responsible mother of 5 children. She lives in Reussey Keo commune, Phnom Penh, where she works as a local rice farmer who cultivates crops throughout the year. She and her husband have been working in this business for 19 years. Rice is the main source of the family’s income.

To improve her business, Chhin would like to take out a loan of $600 USD to purchase a threshing machine. She can rent the machine to local villagers in exchange for additional income. With the additional income generated, Chhin will save for her children’s future education and renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase a threshing machine.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. 

For the past four years, she has operated a poultry retail business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more profit.

With the requested KES 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase chicks and chicken feeds. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feeds.

loans.name: Yura

texts.ru:
Юра занимается земледелием и разведением крупного рогатого скота в деревне Чакатен, Сюникского региона, на протяжении 18 лет. Он выращивает овощи и зерновые культуры на продажу. Полученную сельскохозяйственную продукцию: молоко, мясо, овощи и зерновые культуры он продает в городе Капане. 
У Юры также имеется сельскохозяйственная техника: трактор и пресс для укладки сена в тюки. С помощью данной техники, Юра предоставляет платные услуги в деревнях Сюникской области. Данный факт позволяет Юре получать хорошую прибыль в течение  сельскохозяйственного сезона: с июня по сентябрь.
Юре 48 лет. Он женат и у него двое детей: сын и дочь. Дочь Юры живет со своей семьей отдельно от родителей. Сын Юры женат и они с семьей живут с родителями. В данный момент сын Юры находиться в России. Жена Юры помогает мужу в сельском хозяйстве, и благодаря своему сельскохозяйственному бизнесу они содержат семью. 
Юре необходим кредит на сумму 400.000 для покупки жатки, а также для ремонта трактора. Приобретение жатки позволит Юре увеличить доход своей семьи.
texts.en:
Yura has been involved in farming and breeding cattle in the Chakaten village of the Syunik region for 18 years.  He grows vegetables and cereal crops for sale.  He sells his agricultural products: milk, meat, vegetables and cereal crops, in the city of Kapan.  Yura also owns agricultural machinery: a tractor and a press for packing hay into bales.  Yura provides paid services with the help of this machinery in the villages of the Syunik region.  This fact allows Yura to make a good profit during the agricultural season, which lasts from June through September.
Yura is 48 years old, married and has two children: a son and a daughter.  Yura's daughter lives with her own family separately from the parents.  Yura's son is married, and he and his family live together with the parents.  Currently, Yura's son is in Russia.  Yura's wife helps her husband with the agricultural business, and thanks to their business, they support the family.  Yura needs a loan in the amount of 400,000 dram to purchase a reaping machine and repair his tractor.  Purchasing a reaping machine would allow Yura to increase his family's income.

loans.use: to buy a reaping machine and repair his tractor

loans.name: Ana Liseth

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, para invertirlo en la granja, pues quiere comprarse 4 cerdos para engordar, con esta nueva inversión estará mejorando la disponibilidad para ofrecer a los clientes.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, permitiéndole ampliar la granja y de la cual obtuvo buenas ventas, solventando mucho su situación económica.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a new loan to invest in the farm. She wants to buy 4 pigs to fatten. With this new investment she will improve the resources to offer her customers. 

The previous loan had a positive effect, permitting her to expand the farm with which she was able to obtain good sales, improving very much her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy 4 pigs

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Berta Marina

texts.es:
Berta, quiere seguir creciendo en el negocio, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprar materiales para su negocio de refresquería, como azúcar, piñas, melones, horchata, entre otros productos para poder continuar elaborando los refrescos.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a tener más variedad en las ventas, con la oportunidad de crecer en sus ingresos, tambien aumentaron sus clientes.
texts.en:
Berta wants to continue growing in the business and this is why she’s asking for a new loan to buy supplies for her refreshment stand like sugar, 
pineapples, melons and rice water, among other products to continue making her refreshments.

The previous loan helped her have more variety in sales with the opportunity to increase income; the number of her customers also increased.

loans.use: to buy sugar, pineapples, melons and rice water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts.

loans.name: Precila

texts.es: Precila es socia del Bancomunal Suni, tiene 68 años de edad, es dueña de una chacra donde siembra choclo, es madre de 5 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú hace 13 años,aprendió la responsabilidad, la honestidad, a ahorrar su dinero y a poder invertir de manera adecuada. Esta muy contenta por todo lo que pudo lograr, gracias a las capacitaciones recibidas en su Bancomunal y a su perseverancia, las ganancias de su negocio fueron utilizadas para el titulo de su hijo.Recuerda que es socia por insistencia de su hija,esta muy feliz por todo lo que aprendió y jamás se arrepentiría de la decisión que tomo al ser parte de Finca Perú. Ahora el préstamo lo destinará para la compra de insecticidas para su chacra y a la contratación de peones.
texts.en:
Precila’s a member of the “Suni” communal bank.  She’s 68 years old and owns a parcel of farmland where she grows potatoes.  She’s the mother of five children and has been a member of Finca Perú for 13 years.  She learned honesty, responsibility and how to save her money to be able to invest in an adequate way.  She is very happy for all she’s accomplished thanks to training received in her communal bank and her perseverance.  Profits from her business were used to pay for her son’s professional title.

She recalls that she’s a member due to her daughter’s insistence and she’s very happy for all she’s learned and will never regret the decision she made to become part of Finca Perú.  

She will use this new loan to buy insecticide for her field and to hire day laborers.

loans.use: to buy insecticide and to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Thong

texts.en:
Thong is a 50-year-old married woman who is responsible for 5 children; two are married and three are single. She is involved in a rice farming business, while her husband is a professional traditional Khmer musician. Thong is going to prepare a wedding party for one of her children in the coming month. 

Due to inadequate funds, Thong has decided to request a loan from HKL, one of Kiva's partners, to pay for the wedding preparations. She has been a client of the firm for a few years, and this is her third loan. She has already paid off her previous loans successfully. In the future, Thong hopes to expand her business and increase her household yield and income.

loans.use: to pay for her child's wedding preparations.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is 37 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store and is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional items to sell such as eggs, cups of noodles, soft drinks, and candies. She has been running the sari-sari store for five years and also earns an income from a piggery business.

Adelina hopes to improve the family's living conditions as she continues working with the help of her loan.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell such as eggs, cups of noodles, soft drinks, and candies

loans.name: Juanito

texts.en:
Juanito is 51 and married with three school-age children. He lives in a village, planting and harvesting rice and vegetables to sell. He aims to increase his yields and income so he can continue sending his children to school to give them a better life. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he needs to increase his income to cover his family's needs. 

Juanito is requesting a loan of PHP 19,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides and to pay for labor to plant rice. He believes that the loan will enable him to improve his farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Kanini

texts.en:
Kanini is a married woman with eight children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past two years, she has operated a retail grocery business, selling at the market to her neighbours. She faces a major challenge of high transportation costs for her business. She dreams of expanding to a cereals shop in the future.

With the requested loan of KES 20,000, Kanini wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, and onions to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Abdukudduskhuja

texts.ru: Абдукуддусхуча уже 15 лет занимается выращиванием картофеля и купле- продажей скота. Он трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек, который женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Абдукуддусхуча хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль на содержание семьи. Ему выгодно выращивает сельхозпродукты, так как отходы от выращенных культур идут на корм скота. Абдукуддусхуча запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Abdukudduskhuja has been involved in growing potatoes and buying and selling livestock for 15 years.  He is a hardworking and goal-oriented person, who is married and has three children.  Abdukudduskhuja wants to expand his business in order to make a good profit to support his family.  It is advantageous for him to grow agricultural crops because the leftovers from grown crops go toward feeding the livestock.  Abdukudduskhuja is requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru:
Бактыгул 46 лет, замужем, мать двоих детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Бактыгул занимается садоводством и полеводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи овощей и фруктов. На данный момент в хозяйстве Бактыгул имеется  одна дойная корова и 0,5 га земли.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бактыгул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян и удобрений. Доходы Бактыгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Baktygul is 46 years old, married and is a mother of two children.  To provide a source of income for her family, Baktygul is involved in gardening and farming.  The business, started with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS), today yields about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of vegetables and fruits.  Currently, Baktygul's business contains one dairy cow and 0.5 hectares of land.  In order to further develop her business, Baktygul requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy seeds and fertilizers.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a future expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Emmah

texts.en:
Emmah is a married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past four years, she has operated a beauty salon where neighbours and passersby are her customers. She dreams of expanding her business and hiring more employees in the future.

With the requested loan of KES 40,000, Emmah wants to purchase beauty products, hairpieces, perfumes, and hair oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products, hairpieces, perfumes, and hair oil.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie works hard to support her family. She is single and has a business selling sand and gravel in the Philippines.

Melanie has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy sand and gravel to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for two years now and also earns additional income from food vending.

In the future, Melanie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sand and gravel to sell to customers.

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en: Dennis is 24 years old. He runs a retail shop to earn a living, and he has been in the business for three years. He describes his customers as low-income because they live in slums. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Dennis has been able to improve his business, and he hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil, and sodas to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, cooking oil, and sodas to sell

loans.name: Restuta

texts.en:
Restuta lives in Uganda. She is widowed and has 5 children, none of whom is in school.  She also takes care of additional family members. Restuta has a business selling charcoal. She has been in this business for over 1 year, and she works 7 days out of every week. She retails her products at the market. 

Restuta lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family. She also generates additional income by renting out rooms.

Restuta has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. Her main business challenges include thieves and transportation.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler and also to own a delivery van to ease transportation.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 42 years old and married with one child. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosemary has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns additional income from basket weaving. Rosemary is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Merly

texts.es: Merly de 43 años de edad es una mujer casada que tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 17 a 24 años. Ella vive en la ciudad de Cartagena donde tiene una panadería-repostería y vende panes, pudines y postres de  diversos colores, tamaños y formas; negocio para el que obtuvo su experiencia trabajando en panaderías del sector y que posteriormente se capacitó para desarrollar la tarea de una manera técnica y  desarrollar las buenas prácticas aprendidas en la academia. En la actualidad Merly provee de refrigerios, que incluyen sus productos, a 3 colegios en la comunidad donde habita y también tienen como clientes a hogares de bienestar cercanos, a quienes les vende los panes que dan a los niños cuidados por  madres sustitutas, en el programa de protección infantil del estado nacional. Las ventas las realiza diariamente mediante créditos que otorga entre 30 y 45 días;   esta forma de vender le genera uno  de sus mayores desafíos, que es el de tener efectivo disponible para provisionar los restaurantes escolares  y para invertir en sus enseres que están depreciados y generan incomodidades en sus procesos. En la actualidad Merly está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos para apalancar los créditos que hace a sus clientes. Su inversión será exitosa porque cubrirá su demanda habitual y tendrá recursos para surtir su negocio y captar la atención de nuevos clientes, pues la demanda no la está satisfaciendo.
texts.en:
Merly, 43, is a married woman who has three children between the ages of 17 and 24.  She lives in the city of Cartagena where she has a bakery/pastry shop selling bread, puddings and desserts in various colors, sizes and shapes.  She gained experience in this type of business working for several bakeries in the sector and then took courses to develop the tasks with more technical skills and good practices learned in the academy.

Currently, Merly provides refreshments which include her products to three schools in the community she resides in and she also has nearby children's homes as clients where her bread is fed to children cared for there by substitute mothers as part of the national children’s protection services.

Her sales are daily and she grants credit terms of 30 to 45 days.  This form of selling creates one of her greatest challenges which is to have cash available to supply the school cafeterias and to invest in depreciated equipment; it creates inconveniences in her processes.  

Merly is applying for a Kiva loan at present, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy raw materials and supplies to carry her over while her customer credits are repaid.  Her investment will be successful because she will meet her usual demand and will have resources to stock her business and attract the attention of new customers because she’s not currently able to meet demand.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Rosa Imelda

texts.es:
Rosa, quiere mantener el negocio, por eso está solicitando un préstamo para mantener el nivel de inventario para su producción de platilos tipicos y comida rapida, esta compra será en maíz, leña, aceite, y otros condimentos que son necesarios para el negocio.
Con su préstamo anterior mejoro el negocio, comprando tambien materiales para mejorar las ganancias, la condición de ella y su familia ha mejorado.
texts.en:
Rosa wants to stay in business and this is why she’s asking for a loan to maintain her inventory levels to produce traditional dishes and fast food.  She will buy corn, firewood, oil and other condiments needed for the business.

With her previous loan she improved the business also buying supplies to improve profits; her and her family’s condition has improved.
.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil and firewood.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, siempre está dedicado a la agricultura, solicita otro préstamo para iniciar la siembra de maíz, pues comprara abono, semilla, alambre para cercar el terreno, donde cultivara.
El manifiesta que con el préstamo anterior aumento la productividad de maíz, manteniendo mejores ingresos de la cosecha, tambien la utilizo para la alimentación, considera estar mejor económicamente, con la esperanza que este nuevo préstamo le sirva de igual manera.
texts.en:
Oscar is always working in agriculture.  He’s asking for another loan to start planting corn; he will buy manure, seeds and wire to fence the field where he’ll grow.

He states that with the previous loan corn production increased obtaining better income from the harvest.  He also used it for food.  He feels that he’s better economically and hopes this new loan will also serve him well.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds and wire.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past three years, she has operated a grocery selling business, selling at retail to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Monica dreams of expanding her business in the future.

With the KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase mangoes, tomatoes and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase mangoes, tomatoes and onions.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a married woman with one child who attends school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. 

For the past three years, she has operated a restaurant business selling to her neighbors and passersby. She dreams of expanding her business and hiring more employees in the future.

With the KSHS 50,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking fat oil. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking fat oil.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah lives in Uganda. She is single and has 5 children, four of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (her elderly parents). Sarah lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity but doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees, rent, and feeding the family.

Sarah has a business selling local gin. She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Sarah retails her products at the market. 

Sarah has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more jerrycans of gin. Her main business challenges include thieves and transportation. Her goals and aspirations are to start going to villages in Kasese for local gin and to build her own house.

loans.use: To buy more jerrycans of local gin

loans.name: Senderos De Paz Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Senderos de Paz está integrado por tres socias, las cuales realizan diferentes actividades económicas en la Aldea de San Nicolás, Juticalpa, Olancho. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Marlen, ella tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos, su esposo trabaja en los E.U.A. es una familia muy trabajadora y honrada. Marlen inició vendiendo unos cuantos productos de abarrotería y se dio cuenta de que las ganancias eran muy buenas así que decidió instalar una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación que atiende ella misma desde las 6:00 am hasta las 9:00 pm. La ventaja es que tiene muy buenas ganancias en su negocio, y le da para sostener a su familia y educar a sus hijos. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar unos balcones y pintar su casa. Con el apoyo del préstamo tendrá mayor seguridad en su hogar ya que pondrá los balcones. La señora Marlen actualmente no enfrenta ningún problema de salud pero en algunas temporadas las ventas bajan y sus ganancias también. Su meta es que las ventas en su negocio se mantengan estables para poder llevar el sustento a su familia. Ella tiene más de quince ciclos en FAMA y está muy agradecida con el apoyo que ha recibido.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Senderos de Paz has three members who work in different economic activities in the village of San Nicolás, Juticalpa, Olancho. 

The group coordinator is Marlen, who is 37 years old, and married with three children. Her husband works in the United States. It is a hardworking and honest family. 

Marlen began selling a few grocery store products and realized that the earnings were very good and so she decided to set up a little grocery store in her home that she attends to from 6:00 AM until 9:00 PM. The advantage is that she has very good profits in the business and it allows her to support her family and educate her children. 

She is asking for a loan in order to put in balconies and to paint her house. With the help of the loan, she will have better security for her house because she will put in the balconies. 

Marlen currently has no financial status problems but in some seasons the sales are low and therefore her sales. Her goal is for her business to remain stable in order to be able to go on supporting her family. She has more than 15 cycles with FAMA and is very grateful for the help she has received.

loans.use: to make improvements to her housing

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Ángela, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la granja, comprara 4 cerdos de engorde, para su granja, esto le ayudara para mantener suficiente cantidad y poder generar a futuro ganancias.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a la compra de insumos agricolas, ya que realizo la siembra de maiz, sus condiciones económicas ha sido más solventes, cancelo las cuotas de este préstamo, y espera seguir siendo buen cliente para la institución.
texts.en:
Ángela’s asking for a new loan to invest in her farm; she will buy four pigs to fatten up for her farm which will help her have enough quantity to generate future profits.

She feels that the previous loan helped her to buy farm supplies since she planted corn.  Her economic conditions are more solvent.  She repaid the loan and expects to continue to be a good client of the institution.

loans.use: to buy four pigs.

loans.name: Alcides Antonio

texts.es: Alcides Antonio es un emprendedor que ha luchado de ser seguir su sueño de tener su propio negocio y sacar a su familia adelante, este emprendedor ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000 en crédito en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y muy trabajadora con el crédito anterior invirtió en el negocio en la compra de variedad de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de productos como granos básicos, aceite, golosinas, jabón, detergentes, huevos, pan entre otros.
texts.en: Alcides Antonio’s an entrepreneur who has striven to follow his dream of having his own business and move his family forward.  This entrepreneur has been working with a Fundación León 2000 loan and he’s shown himself to be a responsible, very hardworking person.  He used the previous loan to buy a variety of products to offer his customers.  He is now asking for financing to buy products like basic grains, oil, snacks, soap, detergent, eggs and bread, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Martha Irene

texts.es: Martha es socia del Bancomunal Suni, tiene 47 años de edad, es madre de 4 hijos, ella es socia de Finca Perú hace 11 años, es dueña de una tienda de abarrotes, ella aprendió en Finca Perú a ser buena negociante, como tratar al cliente y ser autosuficiente, también gracias a Finca Perú ella pudo construir su casa, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, leche, verduras y bebidas.
texts.en: Martha’s a member of the “Suni” communal bank.  She’s 47 years old and the mother of four children. She’s been associated with Finca Perú for 11 years.  She owns a grocery store.  In Finca Perú she learned how to be a good businesswoman, how to treat her customers and how to be self-sufficient.  Also, thanks to Finca Perú she was able to build her house.  She will use this loan now to buy rice, sugar, oil, noodles, milk, vegetables and soft-drinks.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, noodles, milk, vegetables and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Lynn

texts.en:
Lynn is 31 years old and married with two children.

Lynn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Lynn has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and earns additional income from selling vegetables.

Lynn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Leonida requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her tailoring business.

She has been in this business for 14 years.

In the future, Leonida would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Romelita

texts.en:
Romelita is 42 years old and married with eight children. Four of her children are in school, and she works very hard to provide for them.

Romelita runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items, such as soap, sugar, and other groceries. 

Romelita requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her convenience store.

loans.name: Chvong

texts.en:
Chvong's priority in life is to improve his family's living conditions. He has six children, some of whom are attending school, and he needs to pay for their daily allowances. He wants to earn consistent profits for their education. That’s why he has devoted himself to his rice farming business and to climbing palm trees for juice. From these activities, he is able to generate an income of four USD per day.

Chvong wants to improve his business and increase his income, so he is asking for a loan of 1,300 USD to purchase two head of cattle. He will use them for farm work and fatten them. He hopes to sell them at a profit in the future and thus ensure a good living for his family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
Shiela is married and has a pig raising business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years, and she works hard to support her family. 

Shiela requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Bobby

texts.en: Bobby, a resident of Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines, is 26 years old and single. Bobby used his last loan to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle. Now he his taking a new loan for his pig raising business. He will use the funds to purchase feed and other supplies. In the future, he hopes to be able to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies for his pigs.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey is 42 years old and married with two children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living. He has been in this business for eight years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. To earn extra income he sells bananas. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Geoffrey has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 80,000 KES to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil, and maize flour for sale.

loans.use: to buy stock for his shop.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Due to the hardship of life, Josephine aimed to improve her small business to support her family. She is now 58 years old and has three grown-up children. Despite being a single parent, she has the determination to give her family a better life. She planned to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers' demands. 

Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional PHP 24,000 to buy soft drinks, breads, canned goods, candies, soaps, shampoos and beverages to sell. She believes that the loan will help her to improve the business and hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, breads, canned goods, candies, soaps, shampoos and beverages to sell

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica is 34 years old and married with four children. She does painting to earn a living and has been in the business for one year. She describes her business environment as busy because many people do business in that place. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy paint.

loans.use: To buy paint

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina works hard to support her family. She is married and has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Josefina requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her abaca weaving business.

She has been in this business for 15 years.

In the future, Josefina would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her abaca weaving business.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 56 years old and married with seven children. She sells cereals to earn a living. She has been in this business for ten years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. To earn extra income she farms. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Rose has been able to improve her living standards and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 20,000 KES to buy bags of maize and beans for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is 35 years old and married with two children. She runs a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in this business for four years and describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Charity has been able to improve her living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 KES to buy potatoes, tomatoes, and vegetables for sale.

loans.use: to buy produce for sale.

loans.name: Marina Isabel

texts.es:
Marina, dese invertir en el negocio de tortillas y venta de leña, para eso solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, por mayor cantidad, para mantener en el hogar y poder vender a los vecinos.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le dio la oportunidad de mejorar el negocio, manteniendo la clientela, esto le ha fortalecido, está motivada por continuar trabajando para superarse con su familia.
texts.en:
Marina wants to invest in her business selling tortillas and firewood. Consequently, she is applying for a loan in order to purchase corn and firewood wholesale. This enables her to provide for her household and sell to her neighbors.

She feels that the earlier loan gave her the opportunity to improve her business, thereby retaining her customers. This has made her stronger. She is motivated to continue working and to succeed with her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 32 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marivic is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marivic has been raising pigs for two years and earns additional income from basket weaving.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Policarpa

texts.en:
Policarpa is 61 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Policarpa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries. 

In the future, Policarpa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Anna Marie

texts.en:
Anna Marie has two children, and she's not yet married. She is 19 years old and lives in Calabayan, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Anna Marie manages a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for five years and earns 3,000 PHP each month. 

Anna Marie requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. She joined GDMPC, a KIVA partner, just this year. Anna Marie hopes to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Pum

texts.en:
Pum, 32, is a hard-working mother. She has gained good practical skills from rice farming because she has been in the business for 11 years. 

Pum would like to maintain her farming business; that is why she decided to borrow additional capital to make improvements on it. She will use the loan to pay for the entire process of planting rice this season. 

In addition to helping her husband in their farming business, Pum also takes care of the family and provides education to her two school-aged children. She wants them to earn university degrees and become professionals. Providing her children with a college education is her priority in life.

loans.use: to pay for the entire process of planting rice this season.

loans.name: Jaime Wilbert

texts.es:
Jaime, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, él sigue siendo empleado de la Alcaldía, pero tiene la oportunidad de realizar la venta de repuestos usados, por esto está con la intensión de invertir un préstamo en la compra de repuestos, que le servirán para la venta y algunos para uso del vehículo propio.
Él considera que el préstamo anterior fue muy importante para salir con el gasto del vehículo, pero que ha logrado pagar el préstamo y ahora iniciar a comercializar repuestos.
texts.en:
Jaime is asking for a new loan. He is still working as a government employee, but he has the opportunity to sell used parts, and so his intention is to invest the money from the loan in the purchase of spare parts, some parts to be used for sales and some to be used for his own vehicle.

He thinks that the previous loan was very important, going towards the vehicle expenditure, but he has has managed to pay the loan and now wants to begin to sell spare parts.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for vehicles

loans.name: Miramin

texts.ru: Мирамин женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей. Более 15 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов и купле- продажей скота. В основном Мирамин выращивает картофель, а затем полученный урожай продает за выгодную цену. Отходы от выращивания сельхозкультур идут на корм скота. В бизнесе помогают дети. Мирамин хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Miramin is married and has six children. He is engaged in the cultivation of agricultural products and in buying and selling livestock for over 15 years. In general, Miramin grows potatoes and then sells them for reasonable prices. The agricultural waste is fed to livestock. His children are helping him in his business. Miramin would like to receive a loan of 5000 Somoni to purchase livestock in order to expand the business. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy livestock

loans.name: Sory Fiorella

texts.es:
Sory es una joven muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus playas hermosas, por sus atractivos turísticos como las Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas; también es conocido por una de sus actividades principales como la pesca y la agricultura y sobre todo por la amabilidad de su gente. Cuando Sory tiene un tiempo libre le gusta leer , sobre todo obras literarias además de comer uno de sus platillos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo “Ají de Gallina”; debido a los pocos recursos económicos solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar administración de empresas.

Sory con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro, logro iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes al día; ella cree que le va bin en su negocio porque es muy carismática y amable con los clientes y sobre todo ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos.
Sory está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la gran ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería en especial ropa de otoño; con lo cual podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ingresos lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada dia para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de administración”.
texts.en:
Sory is young, happy and hardworking. She lives in the city of Pisco, a city that is known for its beautiful beaches, for its tourist attractions such as the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas Chandelier. It is also known for the main activities of fishing and agriculture and above all for the friendliness of the people.
